children.name: visible

parameters.name: visible `Boolean`
parameters.description: A flag indicating if the element should be visible.

children.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the element.Inherited from [Element.visible](element#methods-visible)

children.name: transform

parameters.name: transform `kendo.geometry.Transformation`
parameters.description: The transformation to apply to the element.

children.description: Gets or sets the transformation of the element.Inherited from [Element.transform](element#methods-transform)

children.name: opacity

parameters.name: opacity `Number`
parameters.description: The element opacity. Ranges from 0 (completely transparent) to 1 (completely opaque).

children.description: Gets or sets the element opacity.Inherited from [Element.opacity](element#methods-opacity)If set, the stroke and fill opacity will be multiplied by the element opacity.

children.name: moveTo
Example - Set the path start coordinates

parameters.name: y `Number` *optional*
parameters.description: The starting Y coordinate.Optional if the first parameter is a Point/Array.

parameters.name: x `Number|Array|kendo.geometry.Point`
parameters.description: The starting X coordinate or a Point/Array with X and Y coordinates.

children.description: Clears all existing segments and moves the starting point to the specified absolute coordinates.

children.name: lineTo

parameters.name: y `Number` *optional*
parameters.description: The line end Y coordinate.Optional if the first parameter is a Point/Array.

parameters.name: x `Number|Array|kendo.geometry.Point`
parameters.description: The line end X coordinate or a Point/Array with X and Y coordinates.

children.description: Draws a straight line to the specified absolute coordinates.

children.name: curveTo

parameters.name: controlIn `Array|kendo.geometry.Point`
parameters.description: The second control point for the curve.

parameters.name: controlOut `Array|kendo.geometry.Point`
parameters.description: The first control point for the curve.

children.description: Draws a cubic Bézier curve (with two control points).A quadratic Bézier curve (with one control point) can be plotted by making the control point equal.

children.name: close
children.description: Closes the path by linking the current end point with the start point.

children.name: clippedBBox
children.description: Returns the bounding box of the element with clipping and transformations applied.Inherited from [Element.clippedBBox](element#methods-clippedBBox)

children.name: clip
children.description: Gets or sets the element clipping path.Inherited from [Element.clip](element#methods-clip)

children.name: bbox
children.description: Returns the bounding box of the element with transformations applied.Inherited from [Element.bbox](element#methods-bbox)

children.name: visible
children.description: A flag, indicating if the element is visible.Inherited from [Element.visible](element#configuration-visible)

children.name: transform
children.description: The transformation to apply to this element.Inherited from [Element.transform](element#configuration-transform)

children.name: stroke
children.description: The stroke options of the shape.

children.name: fill
children.description: The fill options of the shape.
